import React from 'react' import '../styling/profile-info.css' const ProfileInfo = ({ userData, propUserData }) => { const now = new Date() const creationDate = new Date(userData.created_at); // Calculate the difference in years, months, and days const diffTime = Math.abs(now - creationDate); const diffYears = Math.floor(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 365)); // Convert milliseconds to years const diffDays = Math.floor(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); // Convert milliseconds to days const age = diff // You can format this however you prefer const accountAge = `${diffYears} years (${diffDays} days)`; return (

{userData.login}

repositories

{userData.public_repos}

friends

{userData.following}

account Age

{accountAge}

bio

{userData.bio}

) } export default ProfileInfo
